title: ARAM bots or leveling script

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: So I just played an ARAM game, and there were clearly 7 out of the 10 champs who were either bots or using leveling scripts as there was clearly no one playing, which is clear from the items/scores and even the names had a similar feel. Not sure what the deal is but if I wanted to play bots I would select that game type.

replies.body: Not really that shocking when you see how much gold and plat accounts sell for OCE servers

What if they remove the exp gain in ARAM?

It would likely initially force them to bot in Summoners Rift, sure.

But when they realize that nobody wants to buy a level 30 account with a 5% win rate and a negative MMR, it may stop
